{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19769v1", "title": "Real Paley-Wiener theorems for the linear canonical Dunkl transform", "summary": "We examine the Sobolev space associated with the linear canonical Dunkl
transform and explore some properties of the linear canonical Dunkl operators.
Building on these results, we establish a real Paley-Wiener theorem for the
linear canonical Dunkl transform. Further, we characterize the
square-integrable function f whose linear canonical Dunkl transform of the
function is supported in the polynomial domain. Finally, we develop the
Boas-type Paley-Wiener theorem for the linear canonical Dunkl transform.", "main_category": "math.CA", "categories": "math.CA,math.FA", "published": "2025-04-28T13:11:09Z"}
